description:
Enter the magical world of Miriel and help her to fulfill her dream on your Palm Pre!

REVIEWS:

"Great game! If you are a fan of Diner Dash, Sally's Spa or other time management games, this one ranks up there with the best of them." -Customer review. 

"Excellent! Loved this one. Not too hard. Very addicting." -Customer review. 

Meet Miriel - a shy but hardworking and earnest young woman who has the gift of magic. The ordinary life of this extraordinary girl is about to suddenly change as she gets the message she has been waiting for months. Enter the magical world of Miriel and help her to fulfill her dreams. Prepare delicious bread and cakes to keep eager customers satisfied while building a general store empire throughout the magical Kingdom. Miriel needs your help!

FEATURES:

-Over 60 levels of Time Management fun! 
-Interactive branching storyline with 13 different endings – the fate of Miriel is in your hands! 
-Six different worlds with their own original atmosphere. 
-Unlock recipes to 19 different items and try making the same products in YOUR home too.
